content: शकुनः [शक्-उनन् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 49</ls>] {@--1@} A bird (in general); शकुनोच्छिष्टं <ls>Y. 1. 168.</ls> {@--2@} A kind of bird, a vulture or kite. {@--3@} A kind of song (sung at festivals). --नं {@--1@} An omen, a prognostic, any omen presaging good or evil; <ls>Śi. 9. 83.</ls> {@--2@} An auspicious omen.
